skills.name: Enchainment
skills.desc: Deals massive Imaginary DMG to a single target, with a high chance of inflicting Imprisonment.

skills.name: Farewell Etiquette
skills.desc: The Sanction Rate level increases when your team uses Skills or Ultimates. When the Sanction Rate reaches its level cap, enters Sanction mode and summons Entranced Ingenium: Illumination Dragonfish.

skills.name: Dread
skills.desc: Increases Sanction Rate level and deals minor Imaginary DMG to all targets. Has a high chance to inflict Weaken on the targets.

skills.name: Restraint
skills.desc: Deals Imaginary DMG to a single target.
